resources.string: NFC is disabled in the Settings. Activate it to be able to use this app.
You have no saved NFC messages, tap the help button at the bottom of your screen to know how to add one.
Choose the kind of message you want to put on the NFC tag.
Long press the record button to record. Your message can\'t be longer than 30 seconds.
Write your text in the box below, it can\'t be more than 100 characters.
Put your phone against the tag you want to read.
Are you sure you want to permanentely delete this recording from this tag?
Error : tag was not detected properly. Try again.
Connection to the server unsuccessful. Make sure you\'re connected and try again.
How to write on an NFC tag?
How to read a tag\'s message ?

An NFC tag is a little piece of cardboard your phone can communicate with using this app. This app allows you to leave this tag on your fridge and lets anyone with this app add different kinds of messages on it, text or audio (pictures and videos coming later).

You can either write text messages directly onto the tag, or record an audio message that will be upload to our server and linked to this tag. Access it using the Write tab on the bottom of the navigation bar.
When on the \"Read\" tab of this app, put your phone against the tag to access its content. It will be added to a list of all the ones you read in the \"Home\" Tab.
In the \"Home\" tab you can scroll through all the messages you saved and play the audio files that came with them. You can delete permanently delete the audio file by long pressing the audio player.
If it\'s not, click this button and choose the type of message you want to write
If this is your first time writing to this tag
How do you wish to name your new tag ? (eg.: Kitchen, Bedroom, Wristband or Keychainâ€¦)
Choose the thumbnail for your tag :
Configuration successful ! You can now write to this tag.
There was an error while communicating with the server. Please try again later.
There was an error connecting to the server. Please check your internet connection.
Please wait while your tag is being configured.
